forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 63F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 51F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 15C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 18C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 66F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
